author: frozenfire.eth
content:
Is there any fundamental reason why calling the modexp precompile with a 2048-bit base, a 1024-bit modulus, and an exponent of 1 would produce an error? It seems to work with 1024-bit base, 512-bit modulus, requiring only ~8k gas.

I'm testing this in forge and remix, so it might just be an issue with their engines, but it fails in both.
